publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8066 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Twestival Local 2011—That the Parliament highlights Twestival Local 2011, which will take place in cities around the world on 24 March; considers that Twestival uses social media for social good by connecting communities on a single day to highlight a great cause, have a fun event and raise important funds, and notes that Edinburgh’s Local Twestival, EdTwestival, will be backing St Columba’s Hospice with a music gig featuring local artists from across the musical genres.

S3M-8066 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Twestival Local 2011—That the Parliament highlights Twestival Local 2011, which will take place in cities around the world on 24 March; considers that Twestival uses social media for social good by connecting communities on a single day to highlight a great cause, have a fun event and raise important funds, and notes that Edinburgh’s Local Twestival, EdTwestival, will be backing St Columba’s Hospice with a music gig featuring local artists from across the musical genres. Supported by: Stewart Maxwell*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-8066 Twestival Local 2011 (lodged on 3 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-8066 Twestival Local 2011 (lodged on 3 March 2011) Stuart McMillan*
